feed.title: SAP Community - SAP BTP, ABAP environment
feed.subtitle: SAP BTP, ABAP environment Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Dont getting the Fiori Administration Launchpad Password
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I have created an ABAP instance on our BTP.

Also i created a Service Key for this instance. 

Now i want to access the Fiori Administrator Launchpad. In the Launchpad i must login, but the Problem is that i dont get any passwort by mail. I only get a email where is written a information:

 

I tried to use the Client Secret key in the Service key, but this also dont works.

Can anyone help me, where i can get the passwort for the Administrator Launchpad? 

Thanks!

entry.title: For a conversion from SAP ECC to S4Hana Private cloud - do we need BTP/Integration suite also ? Can
entry.content:
For a conversion from SAP ECC to S4Hana Private cloud - do we need BTP/Integration suite also ?

Can we integrate S4Hana private cloud with external systems(Hosted on internet), External systems(private network) and client internal network directly. 

1. High level design of how this can be achieved? 

2. What are the pros and cons of this strategy?

entry.title: Updates on ODATA V2 Deprecation
entry.content:
Dear Community,

I have confusion on latest rumors' on stopping support for ODATA v2 from SAP. I am not really finding any SAP note on that to get clear idea. Can someone help me to get it and also do you have idea on below points?

  • If ODATA v2 support is going to stop then what will happen to old service/integrations done with non-sap systems after system upgrade?
  • Are ODATA services created through SEGW comes under ODATA v2?
  • If creating ODATA services is not recommended in SEGW then how same can be done in v4 version(may be following RAP Model)?(Any blog or documentation on creating READ, UPDATE, CREATE Operations in ODATA v4 same like how we were doing in SEGW?)

Thanks for your time in reading my queries, please drop ur comments.

Regards,

Omkar

entry.title: ABAP Environment SaaS: App fails to load Component.js in Consumer Account
entry.content:
Hi SAP Community,

I’m following the ABAP Environment SaaS Solution Mission on SAP Learning Hub (link) and ran into an issue when trying to open a Fiori app delivered via SaaS subscription in the BTP ABAP environment. The app seems to attempt loading its Component.js from https://ui5.sap.com instead of the deployed application, and I’m hoping someone has encountered this before or can provide guidance.

Landscape & Setup

Subaccounts:

  • 00 Landscape Portal
  • 01 Develop
  • 02 Provide
  • 03 Consumer01

ABAP Packages & Apps:

  • /TCON/TRIAL_SERVICE – Simple RAP app to manage employees (First Name, Last Name).
    Screenshot of service package structure:
  • /TCON/EMPLOYEE_UI – Fiori application deployed following this guide (link)
    Screenshot of UI package structure:
  • The Fiori app works fine locally in ABAP system in subaccount 01 Develop.

SaaS Deployment

  • Deployed /TCON/TRIAL as a SaaS solution following the mentioned mission.
  • In Subaccount 02 Provide, created an MTA project to deploy the Approuter.
  • Original xs-app.json:
{
  "authenticationMethod": "route",
  "welcomeFile": "/ui",
  "logout": {
  "logoutEndpoint": "/sap/public/bc/icf/logoff",
  "logoutPage": "/ui"
  },
  "routes": [
    {
    "source": "^/sap/(.*)$",
    "target": "/sap/$1",
    "authenticationType": "xsuaa",
    "service": "com.sap.cloud.abap.solution",
    "csrfProtection": false,
    "endpoint": "abap"
    },
    {
    "source": "^/ui(.*)$",
    "target": "/ui$1",
    "authenticationType": "xsuaa",
    "service": "com.sap.cloud.abap.solution",
    "csrfProtection": false,
    "endpoint": "abap"
    }
  ]
}​
  • Subscribed to the application in the subaccount 03 Consumer01.
  • Assigned Business Roles and Catalogs. App tile appears in the Launchpad.

Issue

  • Clicking the tile shows:
  • Browser developer tools reveal:
The issue is most likely caused by application employees. Please create a support incident and assign it to the support component of the respective application. - Failed to load UI5 component with properties: '{
    "name": "employees",
    "messages": [
        {
            "severity": "error",
            "text": "App  has errors and may not run correctly; see SAP Note 2364579"
        },
        {
            "severity": "error",
            "text": "Error in app component employees: No descriptor was found"
        }
    ],
    "asyncHints": {
        "libs": [
            "sap.ca.scfld.md",
            "sap.ca.ui",
            "sap.me",
            "sap.ui.unified"
        ],
        "preloadBundles": [
            "sap/ushell_abap/bootstrap/evo/core-ext-light-0.js",
            "sap/ushell_abap/bootstrap/evo/core-ext-light-1.js",
            "sap/ushell_abap/bootstrap/evo/core-ext-light-2.js",
            "sap/ushell_abap/bootstrap/evo/core-ext-light-3.js"
        ],
        "waitFor": [
            {}
        ]
    },
    "id": "application-Employees-display-component",
    "componentData": {
        "startupParameters": {},
        "technicalParameters": {}
    },
    "manifest": false
}'. Error likely caused by:
ModuleError: failed to load 'employees/Component.js' from https://ui5.sap.com/1.139.3/resources/employees/Component.js: Failed to execute 'send' on 'XMLHttpRequest': Failed to load 'https://ui5.sap.com/1.139.3/resources/employees/Component.js'.
    at xe (https://ui5.sap.com/1.139.3/resources/sap/ushell_abap/bootstrap/evo/abap.js:9:7011)
    at pe.failWith (https://ui5.sap.com/1.139.3/resources/sap/ushell_abap/bootstrap/evo/abap.js:9:4799)
    at De (https://ui5.sap.com/1.139.3/resources/sap/ushell_abap/bootstrap/evo/abap.js:9:13899)
    at Me (https://ui5.sap.com/1.139.3/resources/sap/ushell_abap/bootstrap/evo/abap.js:9:15920)
    at Object.r [as require] (https://ui5.sap.com/1.139.3/resources/sap/ushell_abap/bootstrap/evo/abap.js:9:19404)
    at https://ui5.sap.com/1.139.3/resources/sap/ushell_abap/bootstrap/evo/core-min-1.js:505:37093
    at new Promise (<anonymous>)
    at https://ui5.sap.com/1.139.3/resources/sap/ushell_abap/bootstrap/evo/core-min-1.js:505:37060
    at async m.instantiateComponent (https://ui5.sap.com/1.139.3/resources/sap/ushell_abap/bootstrap/evo/core-min-3.js:198:2099)
    at async m.createComponent (https://ui5.sap.com/1.139.3/resources/sap/ushell_abap/bootstrap/evo/core-min-3.js:198:1158)
Caused by: NetworkError: Failed to execute 'send' on 'XMLHttpRequest': Failed to load 'https://ui5.sap.com/1.139.3/resources/employees/Component.js'.
    at XHR.send [as _send] (chrome-extension://hkodokikbjolckghdnljbkbhacbhpnkb/ajaxIntercept.js:47:21)
    at a.send (https://ui5.sap.com/1.139.3/resources/sap/ushell_abap/thirdparty/sap-xhrlib-esm.js:5:3611)
    at XMLHttpRequest.send (https://ui5.sap.com/1.139.3/resources/sap/ushell_abap/bootstrap/evo/abap.js:671:318)
    at Ae (https://ui5.sap.com/1.139.3/resources/sap/ushell_abap/bootstrap/evo/abap.js:9:9962)
    at De (https://ui5.sap.com/1.139.3/resources/sap/ushell_abap/bootstrap/evo/abap.js:9:13874)
    at Me (https://ui5.sap.com/1.139.3/resources/sap/ushell_abap/bootstrap/evo/abap.js:9:15920)
    at Object.r [as require] (https://ui5.sap.com/1.139.3/resources/sap/ushell_abap/bootstrap/evo/abap.js:9:19404)
    at https://ui5.sap.com/1.139.3/resources/sap/ushell_abap/bootstrap/evo/core-min-1.js:505:37093
    at new Promise (<anonymous>)
    at https://ui5.sap.com/1.139.3/resources/sap/ushell_abap/bootstrap/evo/core-min-1.js:505:37060 employees​
  • I tried adjusting the xs-app.json and redeployed the Approuter. Current version:
{
  "authenticationMethod": "route",
  "welcomeFile": "/ui",
  "logout": {
    "logoutEndpoint": "/sap/public/bc/icf/logoff",
    "logoutPage": "/ui"
  },
  "routes": [
    {
      "source": "^/employees/(.*)$",
      "target": "/sap/bc/ui5_ui5/TCON/EMPLOYEE_LIST/$1",
      "authenticationType": "xsuaa",
      "service": "com.sap.cloud.abap.solution",
      "csrfProtection": false,
      "endpoint": "abap"
    },
    {
      "source": "^/sap/(.*)$",
      "target": "/sap/$1",
      "authenticationType": "xsuaa",
      "service": "com.sap.cloud.abap.solution",
      "csrfProtection": false,
      "endpoint": "abap"
    },
    {
      "source": "^/ui/?$",
      "target": "/ui",
      "authenticationType": "xsuaa",
      "service": "com.sap.cloud.abap.solution",
      "csrfProtection": false,
      "endpoint": "abap"
    }
  ]
}
​
  • But the error persists.

Any hints for configuring paths correctly or any idea what I maybe have missed in the mission?
I saw your DevtoberFest session in previous years on ABAP Environment and multitenant SaaS applications, @FrankJentsch – could you maybe give me a hint on this issue?

Thanks in advance for any guidance or pointers!

entry.title: CX_SADL_DUMP_APPL_MODEL_ERROR while sending GET Request to ODATA v4 with /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC
entry.content:
Dear Community,

I am trying to create ODATA V4 as mentioned in SAP Note 2485370, So I created a custom entity in Eclipse and also a Class with below method implemented from interface /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC. 

@EndUserText.label: 'ZSAMPLE_SERVICE'
@ObjectModel.query.implementedBy: 'ABAP:ZCL_SAMPLE_SERVICE'
define custom entity ZSAMPLE_SERVICE
{
   key component_material : abap.char(40);
       fg_material  : abap.char(40);
       fg_material_descr : abap.char(40);
  
}

And Class as below

CLASS ZCL_SAMPLE_SERVICE DEFINITION
  PUBLIC
  inheriting from /iwbep/cx_gateway
  FINAL
  CREATE PUBLIC .

  PUBLIC SECTION.

    INTERFACES /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC.
  PROTECTED SECTION.
  PRIVATE SECTION.
ENDCLASS.



CLASS ZCL_SAMPLE_SERVICE IMPLEMENTATION.
  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~CREATE_ENTITY.

  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~CREATE_REFERENCE.

  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~DELETE_ENTITY.

  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~EXECUTE_ACTION.

  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~EXECUTE_FUNCTION.

  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~READ_ENTITY.

    DATA: TS_DATA TYPE zsample_service.
    TS_DATA-COMPONENT_MATERIAL = '12333333'.
    TS_DATA-FG_MATERIAL = '321'.
    TS_DATA-FG_MATERIAL_DESCR = 'This is material description'.


    IO_RESPONSE->SET_BUSI_DATA( TS_DATA ).
  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~READ_ENTITY_LIST.
    DATA: TS_DATA TYPE zsample_service,
          TT_DATA TYPE TABLE OF zsample_service.
    TS_DATA-COMPONENT_MATERIAL = '12333333'.
    TS_DATA-FG_MATERIAL = '321'.
    TS_DATA-FG_MATERIAL_DESCR = 'This is material description'.
    APPEND TS_DATA TO TT_DATA.
    IO_RESPONSE->SET_BUSI_DATA( TT_DATA[] ).
  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~READ_REF_TARGET_KEY_DATA.

  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~READ_REF_TARGET_KEY_DATA_LIST.

  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~UPDATE_ENTITY.

  ENDMETHOD.

ENDCLASS.

After this, I created service definition to explose above cds entity and then service binding.

When I do Get request to my service URL from postman I am  getting dump saying as below

Error analysis                                                                                    |
|    The application has indicated exception "CX_SADL_DUMP_APPL_MODEL_ERROR" as the                |
|     reason for the                                                                               |
|    termination:                                                                                  |
|    Processing was aborted because of an application modeling error: See previous                 |
|    in exception chain.                                                                           |
|                                                                                                  |
|    The exception is related to the previous exception                                            |
|     "LCX_RAP_QUERY_PROV_BAD_IMPLMNT" that occurred in                                            |
|    program "CL_SADL_UNMANAGED_QUERY_ENGINECP", in line 6 of include                              |
|     "CL_SADL_UNMANAGED_QUERY_ENGINECM00J". The reason for this exception                         |
|    was:                                                                                          |
|    Error occurred during execution of query provider 'ZCL_SAMPLE_SERVICE'                        |
|                                                                                                  |
|    The exception is related to the previous exception                                            |
|     "CX_RAP_QUERY_PROV_CONSTRUCTION" that occurred in                                            |
|    program "CL_RAP_QUERY_PROVIDER_FACTORY=CP", in line 6 of include                              |
|     "CL_RAP_QUERY_PROVIDER_FACTORY=CM004". The reason for this exception                         |
|    was:                                                                                          |
|    Error during construction of the Unmanaged Query Provider for entity                          |
|    ZSAMPLE_SERVICE                                                                               |
|                                                                                                  |
|    The exception is related to the previous exception "CX_SY_CREATE_OBJECT_ERROR"                |
|     that occurred in                                                                             |
|    program "CL_RAP_QUERY_PROVIDER_FACTORY=CP", in line 3 of include                              |
|     "CL_RAP_QUERY_PROVIDER_FACTORY=CM004". The reason for this exception                         |
|    was:                                                                                          |
|    Could not create object; reference variable does not match specified class                    |
|    ZCL_SAMPLE_SERVICE.

Can anyone help on this?

I appreciate your time and reply on this query.

Regards,

Omkar

entry.title: SAP ABAP ADOBE FORMS INTERACTIVITY WITHOUT USING WEBDYNPRO
entry.content:
Hi, 

   I have created standard adobe form , which I was familiar with. But now the requirement got changed and user wants to make few fields as interactive .Once the user clicks on the SAVE button, the data base table has to get updated.  I could able to add button SAVE on the adobe form. I have explored on this. Most of them are using WEBDYNPRO . Is there any alternative to WEBDYNPRO. I want the tables to get updated once the user clicks on the SAVE button on the adobe form.  I am working on GUI.

Regards,
Mohammad Pasha.

entry.title: Connection BAS to TRL instance (Abap trial), Cloud Trial Cockpit environment
entry.content:
Hello

I´m trying to connect BAS to the TRL instance (Abap in cloud trial cockpit environment) and it´s not possible due to error message:
"Authentication incorrect. Please check the SAP BTP destination authentication configuration."

I´m following the indications in:
https://community.sap.com/t5/application-development-and-automation-blog-posts/end-to-end-guide-to-consume-rap-application-to-fiori-using-sap-business/ba-p/13945033

Previosly this method has worked for me without any trouble but, since the trial expires each 3 months, I have to repeat it now.
I can get connected correctly to Abap TRL and I can run correctly BAS from cloud trial cockpit but I can´t connect BAS to Abap TRL to read the backend services.

Any idea? , has it changed the procedure?

I have checked this other procedure

https://developers.sap.com/tutorials/abap-custom-ui-bas-connect-s4hc.html#4b2d6666-e392-440a-b639-3ff4edfe27d6

but in the one hand I´m not sure if it applies to the Cloud Trial Cokpit and in the other I don´t understand some points, for instance:

- "In the SAP S/4HANA Cloud system, navigate to the Communication Systems app"  , where is it in the trial cockpit (or in TRL)  this app?, I don´t see anything similar

-  Where is this "YOUR_SYSTEMS_ID" , maybe is the one in "Communication Systems app"

Name<YOUR_SYSTEMS_ID>_SAML_ASSERTION 

Thanks

entry.title: How to deploy a custom application to a SAP partner demo customizing tenant?
entry.content:
Hi all,

I have create a RAP application in a client's tenant and deployed it to the BPT subbacount cloudfoundry.  The app is available through a site created in SAP Build Workzone.

My requirement is to have that same app available in a SAP Partner Demo Customizing tenant. Is this possible? and what's the best way to achieve this?

Thanks,

entry.title: RAP : Managed with Unmanaged Save with Draft handling Create Mode issue
entry.content:
Hi All,
I have created a Managed app with unmanaged save having code to trigger BAPI to save transactional data.  I have added draft functionality to this app and all works find except for create mode. 

I am able to update root and dependent child node details successfully but when a new Document is created  the earlynumbering_create method is triggered twice and MAPPED table is populated twice.

Thus  cl_numberrange_runtime=>number_get returns 1 Doc # in first run [ Draft mode ]and second run [ After Save is Hit ], Next Document number is generated. This leads to issue that when Document is shown to user a Number is shown

On Save, next Docuement # is crated by method  earlynumbering_create

Could you please suggest if you have came across such issues and solution for the same. 

Thanks !!

entry.title: Unable to Use ZCDS or Any Standard CDS View in AMDP Table Function
entry.content:
Dear All,

I am working in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud  and trying to consume a CDS View in an AMDP Table Function.

However, I am getting the following error during activation: Please see the below Screenshots.

The object DDLS I_PRODUCTIONORDEROPCOMPONENTTP must not be used here, because it is not released for usage in AMDP methods.

Questions:

  1. How can we use a CDS View in an AMDP Table Function in Public Cloud?

  2. How can we release objects from C1 to C4?

  3. Is there any workaround, as this is urgent?

entry.title: Tutorial Class generator(zdmo_cl_fe_travel_generator) not working
entry.content:
Dear Expert, 

Tutorial : Create a Travel App with SAP Fiori Elements Based on OData V4 RAP

class : zdmo_cl_fe_travel_generator is not working, please check!

log as below and attached, please check!

Contents

Header Information
What happened?
Error analysis
Information on where terminated
Source Code Extract
Active Calls/Events

Header Information

Short Text An exception has occurred that was not caught.
Runtime Error UNCAUGHT_EXCEPTION
Exception CX_XCO_GEN_PUT_EXCEPTION
Program CL_XCO_GEN_O_PUT_ABSTRACT=====CP
Application Component BC-SRV-APS-EXT-XCO
Date/Time 12/16/2025 14:12:52 (System)
User CB9980000126 (1765878167245-181841)
Client 100
Host appserver-6nl58

What happened?

The exception of class "CX_XCO_GEN_PUT_EXCEPTION" was triggered but not caught anywhere in the
call hierarchy.

Since exceptions represent error situations, and this error was not
adequately responded to, ABAP program "CL_XCO_GEN_O_PUT_ABSTRACT=====CP" had to be terminated.

Error analysis

An exception has occurred in class "CX_XCO_GEN_PUT_EXCEPTION". As this exception was not
caught, a runtime error occurred. The reason for the exception
occurring was:
PUT operation failed.

Information on where terminated

The termination occurred in ABAP program or include "CL_XCO_GEN_O_PUT_ABSTRACT=====CP", in "IF_XCO_GEN_O_PUT~EXECUTE". The
main program was "SAPMHTTP".

In the source code, the termination point is in line 9 of include "CL_XCO_GEN_O_PUT_ABSTRACT=====CM008".
include "CL_XCO_GEN_O_PUT_ABSTRACT=====CM008".

Source Code Extract

12345678>1011121314
  METHOD if_xco_gen_o_put~execute.
    DATA(lo_ongoing_operation) = create_ongoing_operation( ).
 
    DATA(lo_action) = get_staging( lo_ongoing_operation
      )->get_action( ).
    lo_action->execute( ).
 
    IF lo_action->succeeded NE xco=>boolean->true OR lo_ongoing_operation->has_failed( ) EQ abap_true.
      RAISE EXCEPTION cx_xco_gen_put_exception=>for_ongoing_operation( lo_ongoing_operation ).
    ENDIF.
 
    DATA(lo_findings) = lo_ongoing_operation->get_findings( ).
    ro_result = NEW cl_xco_gen_o_put_result( lo_findings ).
  ENDMETHOD.

Active Calls/Events

No. Event Program Include Line

14IF_XCO_GEN_O_PUT~EXECUTECL_XCO_GEN_O_PUT_ABSTRACT=====CPCL_XCO_GEN_O_PUT_ABSTRACT=====CM0089
13IF_XCO_CP_GEN_D_O_PUT~EXECUTECL_XCO_CP_GEN_O_PUT===========CPCL_XCO_CP_GEN_O_PUT===========CM00210
12IF_OO_ADT_CLASSRUN~MAINZDMO_CL_FE_TRAVEL_GENERATOR===CPZDMO_CL_FE_TRAVEL_GENERATOR===CM00L232
11EXECUTE_CLASCL_OO_ADT_RES_CLASSRUN========CPCL_OO_ADT_RES_CLASSRUN========CM003111
10POSTCL_OO_ADT_RES_CLASSRUN========CPCL_OO_ADT_RES_CLASSRUN========CM00429
9IF_REST_HANDLER~HANDLECL_ADT_REST_RESOURCE==========CPCL_ADT_REST_RESOURCE==========CM00424
8IF_REST_HANDLER~HANDLECL_REST_ROUTER================CPCL_REST_ROUTER================CM00360
7IF_HTTP_EXTENSION~HANDLE_REQUESTCL_REST_HTTP_HANDLER==========CPCL_REST_HTTP_HANDLER==========CM00199
6LIF_REQUEST_HANDLER~HANDLE_REQUESTCL_ADT_WB_RES_APP=============CPCL_ADT_WB_RES_APP=============CCIMP19
5HANDLE_REQUESTCL_ADT_WB_RES_APP=============CPCL_ADT_WB_RES_APP=============CCIMP319
4IF_HTTP_EXTENSION~HANDLE_REQUESTCL_ADT_WB_RES_APP=============CPCL_ADT_WB_RES_APP=============CM00223
3EXECUTE_REQUESTCL_HTTP_SERVER================CPCL_HTTP_SERVER================CM00I814
2HTTP_DISPATCH_REQUESTSAPLHTTP_RUNTIMELHTTP_RUNTIMEU021834
1%_HTTP_STARTSAPMHTTPSAPMHTTP12

entry.title: Unable to find "Maintain Communication Users" or "SAP_BR_ADMINISTRATOR" in Cloud Shared Trial
entry.content:
Hi Everyone,

I am currently working through a development scenario in the SAP S/4HANA Cloud Shared Trial (US10). I have created a custom Communication Scenario in Eclipse (ADT) and I am now trying to set up the inbound communication.

According to the documentation, I need to use the Maintain Communication Users app to create a technical user (ZXE3_FITFOR). However, I am facing the following issues:

  • App Missing: The "Maintain Communication Users" app does not appear in my Fiori Launchpad or in the App Finder.

  • Role Missing: I cannot find the SAP_BR_ADMINISTRATOR role template to assign the necessary permissions to my user.

  • Restricted Access: I attempted to check the Technical Monitoring Cockpit, but it only provides read-only metrics and no user creation capabilities.

I understand that the Shared Trial is a restricted environment. Is it possible to activate the SAP_CORE_BC_COM (Communication Management) catalog in this specific trial, or is this administrative functionality completely disabled for shared users?

If this is a limitation of the Shared Trial, would moving to a BTP ABAP Environment Trial be the correct path to gain the administrator rights needed for Communication Management?

Any guidance would be greatly appreciated!

entry.title: XCO_CP_XLSX Currency/Quantity Formatting
entry.content:
Is it possible to apply Currency/Quantity/Domain(Conversion Exit) formatting, while writing to an Excel file using XCO_CP_XLSX?

PS: Not looking for this answer: Convert all fields to Strings.

Whoever has SAP S-User-ID, please vote here to have this feature included in XCO_CP_XLSX:

https://influence.sap.com/sap/ino/#/idea/364375

entry.title: Is it possible to extend SAP Task Center UI on SAP BTP?
entry.content:
I am currently working with SAP Task Center on SAP BTP, accessed through SAP Build Work Zone.

I would like to know if there is any possibility to extend the user interface, for example by adding custom buttons, actions, or business-specific UI elements, in order to improve the user experience when handling tasks.

My goal is to understand the supported extensibility options and limitations for SAP Task Center within SAP BTP.

entry.title: I need a POV using Joule via BTP, but keeping data and execution on-prem or in NS2.
entry.content:
I need a POV using Joule via BTP, but keeping data and execution on-prem or in NS2.  Here is my answer, wanted review of my pov.

POV

1. Architecture Approach

  • Hybrid Model:
    • Joule UI & orchestration via SAP BTP (public cloud).
    • Data & execution remain on-prem or NS2 using:
      • SAP AI Core/AI Foundation deployed in NS2 or on-prem.
      • Secure connectors (SAP Cloud Connector, Private Link) for controlled interaction.
  • Inference Strategy:
    • Joule prompts processed in BTP but routed to local AI runtime for execution.
    • Sensitive data never leaves NS2/on-prem; only metadata or anonymized context flows to BTP.

2. Key Benefits

  • Compliance & Sovereignty:
    • Meets FedRAMP, ITAR, and other regulatory requirements.
  • Performance & Latency:
    • Local execution reduces dependency on public cloud for heavy workloads.
  • Innovation Access:
    • Still leverages Joule’s capabilities without compromising security.

3. Challenges

  • Integration Complexity:
    • Requires robust connectivity and governance between BTP and NS2/on-prem.
  • Feature Parity:
    • Some Joule features may depend on public cloud AI services; need fallback or custom models locally.
  • Cost & Maintenance:
    • Running AI Core locally adds infrastructure overhead.

4. Recommended Actions

  • Assess Use Cases:
    • Identify which Joule scenarios require sensitive data handling.
  • Deploy AI Core in NS2:
    • Use SAP AI Core/AI Foundation for local inference.
  • Implement Secure Connectivity:
    • SAP Cloud Connector + Private Link for controlled communication.
  • Governance Framework:
    • Define data classification, prompt filtering, and audit mechanisms.

Key Components

  1. Joule Interface
    Embedded in SAP applications (e.g., S/4HANA, SuccessFactors) for user interaction.

  2. SAP BTP (Public Cloud)
    Acts as the orchestration layer for Joule, handling prompt routing and metadata exchange.

  3. Secure Connectivity

    • SAP Cloud Connector and Private Link ensure encrypted, controlled communication between BTP and NS2/on-prem systems.

  4. On-Prem/NS2 AI Runtime

    • SAP AI Core/AI Foundation deployed locally for inference and processing.
    • Sensitive data never leaves the secure environment.

  5. ERP Systems (S/4HANA, ECC)
    Hosted in NS2/on-prem for transactional and operational data.

  6. Compliance & Governance Layer

    • Enforces FedRAMP, ITAR, and other regulatory standards.
    • Includes audit, logging, and prompt filtering.

Data Flow

  • User → Joule → BTP → Secure Connector → NS2 AI Core → ERP Systems
  • Only metadata or anonymized context flows to BTP; all sensitive data and execution remain local.

Benefits

  • Regulatory Compliance: Meets strict security and sovereignty requirements.
  • Innovation Access: Leverages Joule without compromising sensitive data.
  • Performance: Local execution reduces latency for critical workloads.

entry.title: BTP Trial account link is not loaded when clicked. seems to be a bug. Kindly solve it please
entry.content:
'Goto BTP Trial account' link is not opening at all in SAP BTP Trial account website.

Seems to be a bug.

Could any of you please help resolve this to continue working?
